alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Montgomery (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 6:26PM CDT until May 07 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE AND SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 626 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Coffeen, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...At 618 PM, trained weather spotters reported quarter-sized hail in Hillsboro, Illinois. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Fayette and southeastern Montgomery Counties, including the following locations... Bayle City, Fillmore, Bingham, Chapman , and Irving. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
